attributes.action: Stop the ridiculous situation where Royal Mail has to deliver its Competitors Mail.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Royal Mail, under current restrictions is obliged by  Postcomm to deliver it's competitors mail at a  low cost and at huge loss. Royal Mail still delivers all letter post in this Country and it is being eroded by a Business practice  that would not be forced upon any other area of Business. Allow Royal Mail to compete on a level playing field by forcing its competitors to do their own work and share the burden of costs. The public can then make up their own minds about who provides the better service.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
